definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Conclusions Synovial sarcoma of the hypopharynx is a malignant soft-tissue tumor that is seen rarely in the head and neck.
sentences.chinese: 結論喉咽部滑膜肉瘤是頭頸部罕見的軟組織惡性腫瘤。

sentences.english: The death rate of the cancer of breast, lung, bone and leukemias in Xinjiang resident are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 放射性所致居民受照劑量和居民的惡性腫瘤死亡率等。

sentences.english: Effects of postoperative radiotherapy on 110 cases of malignant salivary gland tumors.
sentences.chinese: 大涎腺惡性腫瘤術後放療110例療效分析。

sentences.english: Ovarian cancer is a common gynecologic malignancy that usually can not be detected at early stage.
sentences.chinese: 卵巢惡性腫瘤是婦科常見的腫瘤，早期不易發現。

sentences.english: Mitoses by themselves are not indicators of malignancy.
sentences.chinese: 核分裂的出現不能說明惡性腫瘤的存在。

sentences.english: Effects of Kanglaite on cachexia and immune function of the patients with advanced cancer.
sentences.chinese: 康萊特對晚期惡性腫瘤患者惡病質和免疫功能的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To research the synergism and attenuation of insulin on chemotherapy of malignant tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究胰島素對惡性腫瘤化療的增效減毒作用。

sentences.english: High grade tumors show markedly irregular architecture and cellular pleomorphism.
sentences.chinese: 高度惡性腫瘤表現出明顯的結構不規則和細胞多形性。

sentences.english: Mucoepidermoid carcinoma is the most common malignant disease in salivary gland.
sentences.chinese: 粘液表皮樣癌是常見的涎腺惡性腫瘤。

sentences.english: Objective To analysis the characteristics and clinical features of uterine neoplasms developed after radiation therapy for cervical carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析宮頸癌放療後子宮體惡性腫瘤的臨牀特點。

sentences.english: The incidence of olfactory neuroblastoma was the second common ocular malignant tumor.
sentences.chinese: 嗅神經母細胞瘤的發病率在惡性腫瘤中居第二位。

sentences.english: Primary leiomyosarcoma of the lung is a rare malignant tumor.
sentences.chinese: 肺原發性平滑肌肉瘤是一種罕見的惡性腫瘤。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the efficacy of neoadjuvant chemotherapy in the treatment of gynecological malignance.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價新輔助化療在婦科惡性腫瘤治療中的有效性。

sentences.english: There are more than 100 types of cancer, characterized by abnormal cell growth.
sentences.chinese: 以反常細胞增殖爲特點的惡性腫瘤有100多種類型。

sentences.english: The most common malignancy was malignant lymphoma and Kaposi sarcoma.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的惡性腫瘤爲卡波西氏肉瘤及惡性淋巴瘤。

sentences.english: Objective To describe general characteristics of the malignant tumors of infratemporal space.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結顳下間隙惡性腫瘤的臨牀特點。

pinyin: zi4 ti3 mian3 yi4 ji2 bing4
